subject: Harness Racing
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Somebeachsomewhere — who set an earnings record, equaled the fastest time for a mile and won 14 of 15 races — was named Horse of the Year at harness racing’s Night of Champions awards dinner.
snippet: Somebeachsomewhere — who set an earnings record, equaled the fastest time for a mile and won 14 of 15 races — was named Horse of the Year at harness racing’s Night of Champions awards dinner.
